    • Uses of BeanTweet in persistence

      Methods in persistence that return BeanTweet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BeanTweet TweetDAO.getTweet(int tweetID)
      Get the tweet with the given ID
      Methods in persistence that return types with arguments of type BeanTweet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<BeanTweet> TweetDAO.getFilteredTweetsList(int userID, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> subscriptors)
      Gets the tweets list filtering by user's, user subscriptior's tweets and public user's tweets
      java.util.ArrayList<BeanTweet> TweetDAO.getFullTweetsList()
      Gets the full tweets list, it is meant for admin users
      java.util.ArrayList<BeanTweet> TweetDAO.getPersonalizedTweetsList(int userID, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> subscriptors)
      Gets the tweets list filtering by user's and user subscriptior's tweets
      Methods in persistence with parameters of type BeanTweet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TweetDAO.editTweet(BeanTweet tweet)
      Updates the tweet register with the given ID of the tweets table
      void TweetDAO.insertTweet(BeanTweet tweet)
      Inserts a tweet into the tweets table on the DB
      void TweetDAO.updateLike(BeanTweet tweet)
      Updates the number of likes of a tweet register in the tweets table

    • Uses of BeanTweet in service

      Methods in service that return BeanTweet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BeanTweet TweetService.getTweet(int idTweet, int userID)
      Gets the tweet from the DB and enrichs it with information not stored in the DB.
      BeanTweet TweetService.retweet(int userID, int tweetID, java.sql.Date date)
      Retweet a tweet, this means that inserts a new tweet into the database, with the retweeted tweet description and hashtag, but with the retweeter user as the owner, with new date and likes setted to zero again
      Methods in service that return types with arguments of type BeanTweet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<BeanTweet> TweetService.getTweetsList(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String personalized)
      Returns the tweet list filtred according to user profile and storyline configuration and ordered by date and likes

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
